_get_run_params(run) → Optional[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]¶

Returns parameters of a given run.

Parameters

run (int) – Run number.

Returns

df – DataFrame with columns ‘bar’, ‘tof_offset’, ‘tof_offset_err’. If the run is not found or the file is incompleted (not containing all bars, 1 - 24, inclusively), then it returns None.

Return type

pd.DataFrame or None
